product_name: Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator with Two 16g Cartridges
long_description: A compact inflator that gets you back in the saddle quickly, the Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator features a knob to control the rate of inflation and includes two CO2 cartridges. Precision-machined body and head with Airflation Control(TM) knob for easy adjustment while you are filling up your tire. Includes insulated sleeve to prevent frozen fingers. Fits Presta and Schrader valves without adapters. The Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator is compatible with threaded cartridges (cartridges sold separately).
short_description: A compact inflator that gets you back in the saddle quickly, the Planet Bike Red Zeppelin CO2 Tire Inflator features a knob to control the rate of inflation and includes two CO2 cartridges.
